p:
It is also important to mention that many works on the molecular epidemiology of HIV-1 remove resistance-associated positions from the analysis, in order to prevent spurious clustering by convergent evolution. In our analyses, we did not remove those positions because their impact on the detection of transmission clusters has been demonstrated to be irrelevant
42 . Furthermore, a great majority of our sequences were known to derive from treatment-na√Øve patients (only 66 patients were known to have been treated).
